name: Yuie.exe
description:
This project was made in three weeks during my first time using Unity to create a project. This project was part of a college assignment titled "Make a Game" in an Introduction to Unity class where students were tasked to create a game in Unity in three weeks. I submitted this game to Neumont College of Computer Science's Project Showcase where it was voted 1st place in the game category. There is no future to this game solely to show off how well put together of a game it is with only three weeks of designing and coding.

THIS GAME IS VERY BROKEN!

WASD - Move
Space - Jump
1 - Cycle inventory
E - dodge
Click right click when sword equipped - Swing sword
Hold left click when fireball equipped -  Shoot fireball
